summary: GPT-5 released Aug 2025, GPT-5.2 Dec 2025. GPT-6 expected in 2026 but no firm date. Manifold gives 17% for GPT-6 before June 1, 76% for GPT-6 in 2026.
content:
Key findings:
- GPT-5 released ~Aug 2025, GPT-5.1 followed, GPT-5.2 introduced Dec 11, 2025
- OpenAI confirmed GPT-6 will NOT launch in 2025, sometime in 2026
- Sam Altman hinted at faster dev cycle than GPT-4â†’GPT-5 (2+ years), teased "big upgrade in Q1 2026"
- No official release date for GPT-6
- Multiple sources speculate "first half of 2026" or "early 2026"
- OpenAI acknowledges compute/inference bottlenecks limiting deployment
- Manifold: "GPT-6 before June 1, 2026" = 16.6% (7.2k mana volume)
- Manifold: "GPT-6 released in 2026" = 76.3% (6.2k mana volume)
- Manifold: "frontier model >5.2 before March 1, 2026" = 80.1%
- This gap (80% for new model soon, but only 17% for GPT-6 name) suggests next release likely NOT named GPT-6
- Question requires explicit "GPT-6" naming and general public availability before May 1, 2026
